scripts.build: cd packages/rollup-plugin && pnpm build && cd ../frontend-event-emitter && pnpm build && cd ../extension && pnpm build && cd ../project-helper && pnpm build && cd ../scaffold && pnpm build
scripts.build:release: cd packages/rollup-plugin && pnpm build && cd ../frontend-event-emitter && pnpm build && cd ../extension && pnpm build:release && cd ../project-helper && pnpm build && cd ../scaffold && pnpm build:release
